title: When you meet a classmate on an online class, why would they just talk to you when they need help with an assignment? - Quora

response.answer_text: They may be testing the waters. Since they don't know you well, the simplest thing to gauge your personality is to see whether you are being helpful. Then they may decide whether they want to know you better as a friend. Of course, some are just homework-orientated and ask you for help in that area only and nothing else. If they are making use of your kindness, you will know in due course and you could decide whether to ignore them in future. Otherwise, no harm getting to know a few more friends.
Because they only feel the need to talk to you when they need help? They probably aren’t interested in making new friends, but interested in getting good marks you know?
Because they just want help on assignments and are using you for help………………………………………………… or they could be making excuses to try to talk to you because they want to be your friend *wink
